songs.title: Out where creation sings His praise
songs.album: Where the Light of Christ Shines
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Out where creation sings His praise,
The flowers bloom, clothed in His grace.
Mountains bow down, and skies proclaim,
The glory of His holy name.

[Pre-Hook]
The Spirit moves like a gentle breeze,
Filling us with the Truth that sets us free.
In His presence, I find peace,
Where all my fears and doubts will cease.

[Hook]
Where the light of Christ shines bright,
In His love, we find our sight.
We walk the path He made,
Through the valley unafraid.
In fields of grace, we bloom,
In His arms, there’s room,
For every heart to rise,
Where the light of Christ shines.

[Verse 2]
The shepherd leads us by still streams,
He makes us lay down in fields of green.
His mercy flows, so pure, so wide,
His love our never-failing guide.

[Pre-Hook]
The heavens declare His majesty,
In His light, we’re set free.
With every step, His hand I hold,
In His presence, I am bold.

(Hook)
Where the light of Christ shines bright,
In His love, we find our sight.
We walk the path He made,
Through the valley unafraid.
In fields of grace, we bloom,
In His arms, there’s room,
For every heart to rise,
Where the light of Christ shines.

[Bridge]
His kingdom’s come, His will be done,
On earth as it is in Heaven above.
In every flower, in every tree,
I see His love surrounding me.

[Final Hook]
Where the light of Christ shines bright,
In His love, we find our sight.
We walk the path He made,
Through the valley unafraid.
In fields of grace, we bloom,
In His arms, there’s room,
For every heart to rise,
Where the light of Christ shines.
Yes, where the light of Christ shines.

songs.title: Out where creation sings His praise (Remix)
songs.album: Where the Light of Christ Shines

[Verse 1]
Out where creation sings His praise,
The flowers bloom, clothed in His grace.
Mountains bow down, and skies proclaim,
The glory of His holy name.

[Pre-Chorus]
The Spirit moves like a gentle breeze,
Filling us with the Truth that sets us free.
In His presence, I find peace,

[Chorus]
Where the light of Christ shines bright,
In His love, we find our sight.
We walk the path He made,

In fields of grace, we bloom,
In His arms, there’s room,

Where the light of Christ shines.

[Verse 2]
The shepherd leads us by still streams,
He makes us lay down in fields of green.
His mercy flows, so pure, so wide,
His love our never-failing guide.

[Pre-Chorus]
The heavens declare His majesty,
In His light, we’re set free.
With every step, His hand I hold,
In His presence, I am bold.

(Chorus)
Where the light of Christ shines bright,
In His love, we find our sight.
We walk the path He made,
Through the valley unafraid.
In fields of grace, we bloom,
In His arms, there’s room,
For every heart to rise,

[Bridge]
His kingdom’s come, His will be done,
On earth as it is in Heaven above.
In every flower, in every tree,

[Final Chorus]
Where the light of Christ shines bright,
In His love, we find our sight.
We walk the path He made,
Through the valley unafraid.
In fields of grace, we bloom,
In His arms, there’s room,
For every heart to rise,
Where the light of Christ shines.
Yes, where the light of Christ shines.
